"Time to Wake Up":
"Mission: Monitor the suspicious ARKS. A
simple request. A good mission to get
back on your feet. Nobody could have
known that it would be the opening act of
troubles anew.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated."
